prodNameC: 0.8% 利薩夫紅血球試劑套組
prodNameE: Reagent Red Blood Cells 0.8% Resolve Panel
ingredientsDesc:
0.8% RESOLVE Panel A is a series of human red blood cells in 0.8% suspensions from 11 group O individuals.
0.8% RESOLVE Panel B is a series of human red blood cells in 0.8% suspensions from 11 group O individuals.
0.8% RESOLVE Panel C Untreated is a series of human red blood cells in 0.8% suspensions from 11 group O individuals.
0.8% RESOLVE Panel C Ficin Treated consists of the same corresponding red blood cells that have been treated with the proteolytic enzyme ficin prior to suspension.
applicantName: 台灣大昌華嘉股份有限公司

efficacy: 鑑定血液中未知抗體之定性試驗。
